original_text: The leaders would often speak about the good things that Tobiah had done. They would then go and tell Tobiah everything that I had said. So Tobiah continued to send letters to frighten me.
korean_text: 그들이 도비야의 선행을 내 앞에 말하고 또 내 말도 그에게 전하매 도비야가 내게 편지하여 나를 두렵게 하고자 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: about the good things that Tobiah had done
and tell Tobiah everything that I had said
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 말한 모든 것을 도비야에게 알리곤 했

sentences.original_text: to send letters to frighten me
